snippet: Joe Maddon likes to take chances: Schwarber, who hasn’t faced major league pitching since April, will bat fifth in Game One of the World Series....
abstract: Chicago Cubs outfielder Kyle Schwarber says he expects to get emotional during Game 1 of World Series, after improbably recovering from torn anterior cruciate ligament in time to play; city of Cleveland becomes center of sports universe as Game 1 of World Series is played on same evening that Cavaliers raise their NBA championship banner in Quicken Loans Arena before playing season opener against Knicks.
lead_paragraph: Joe Maddon likes to take chances: Schwarber, who hasn’t faced major league pitching since April, will bat fifth in Game One of the World Series.

headline.main: Kyle Schwarber Admits He May Cry Over His Unlikely Return to Action
headline.print_headline: Cubs Slugger Admits He May Cry Over His Unlikely Return to Action
